entry.title: NFTs, Crypto Stolen After Web3 Gaming CEO Gabriel Leydon’s Twitter Hacked
entry.summary: The DigiDaigaku head alleges that an AT&T employee facilitated the attack, and says his company will help affected users.

entry.title: Yuga Labs Is Hiring the ‘Best and Brightest’ to Build the Next Internet, CEO Says
entry.summary: Nicole Muniz clarified the fundamental differences between NFTs and JPEG images, as well as declared Yuga’s intent to hire top Web3 talent.

entry.title: Coinbase Revenue Down 28% as Trading Volume Sinks Amid Brutal Bear Market
entry.summary: Transaction revenue fell 44% compared to the second quarter as fewer users were active on the crypto exchange.

entry.title: Is Solana Decentralized? Cloud Provider Hetzner Ban Raises Questions
entry.summary: The blockchain network depended heavily on the company, which banned all Solana activity on its servers.

entry.title: Goldman Sachs To Standardize Crypto Data for Institutional Investors
entry.summary: The bank has teamed up with global index provider MSCI and data firm Coin Metrics to launch a crypto database.

entry.title: Fan Tokens Are More Utility Driven Than NFTs, Says Socios CEO
entry.summary: Alexandre Dreyfus sets his sights beyond digital collectibles, and shares his dream World Cup final.

entry.title: Final Fantasy Maker Square Enix Reveals Its First Ethereum NFT Game
entry.summary: Square Enix’s first Web3 game is an interactive art-collecting experience with NFT avatars and storytelling.

entry.title: Fidelity Is Offering Early Access to Its New Bitcoin Trading App
entry.summary: The investment giant is launching a product allowing retail investors to trade Bitcoin and Ethereum commission-free.

entry.title: Alchemy Launches NFT Allowlist Platform Spearmint for Ethereum, Layer-2 Projects
entry.summary: Alchemy says the minting process is “the most broken part of building with NFTs.”

entry.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
entry.summary: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: F1 Team Taps OpenSea for Racing NFT Marketplace, Cross Promotion
entry.summary: Sports partnerships continue to be fertile ground for crypto firms, with the Haas F1 team tapping OpenSea for a new NFT expansion.

entry.title: Kraken Launches 70 Ethereum, Solana NFT Collections on New ‘Gasless’ Marketplace
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Kraken is hoping to take on NFT giants OpenSea with gasless transactions and built-in rarity tools.

entry.title: Mastercard Welcomes 7 Crypto, Blockchain Startups to Fintech Innovation Program
entry.summary: Mastercard’s global program attracts applications from over 1,500 startups each year and has helped 350 companies attract billions in funding.

entry.title: Australian Asset Manager Delists Bitcoin, Ethereum ETFs After Just 6 Months
entry.summary: After launching just before the industry's May meltdown, Cosmos Asset Management is shuttering its Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs today.

entry.title: Instagram Influencer Pleads Guilty for Stealing $2.5M in Bitcoin
entry.summary: The accused allegedly offered to purchase Bitcoin at above-market rates, before forging fake wire transfer receipts to victims.

entry.title: Aave Votes to Deploy on Ethereum Layer-2 Solution zkSync
entry.summary: In a unanimous vote, Matter Labs’ proposal to deploy Aave on the testnet for its Ethereum scaler zkSync has been approved.

entry.title: Polygon, Arweave Jump Double Digits as Meta’s Instagram Announces New NFT Tools
entry.summary: Like Reddit, Instagram turned to Polygon for its NFT plans, while attempting to offer users permanent storage through Arweave.

entry.title: BAYC Owner Yuga Labs: Metaverse NFT Open Standards Coming ‘Very Soon’
entry.summary: The Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) creators are hard at work on open standards to enable NFTs to migrate between Otherside and other metaverses.

entry.title: Dapper Labs Slashes Staff by 22 Percent, Citing 'Macroeconomic Environment'
entry.summary: "These reductions are the last thing we want to do, but they are necessary," says the CEO.

entry.title: Singapore Tests Institutional DeFi on Ethereum, Welcomes USDC Issuer
entry.summary: "That’s a huge signal, a super huge signal from a central bank," said one official.

entry.title: NBA Top Shot Just Had Its Worst Month Since 2020
entry.summary: Dapper’s Flow-based collectibles platform yielded just $2.7 million in trades in October as the wider NFT market declined further.

entry.title: Meta’s Instagram Plans NFT Minting, Trading Tools
entry.summary: Instagram will soon have NFT creation and trading tools built in, but in-app purchases will be "subject to applicable app store fees."

entry.title: Coinbase Chief Product Officer Steps Down: 'Time to Get Off the Ride’
entry.summary: Surojit Chatterjee will become an adviser to CEO Brian Armstrong instead.

entry.title: Web3 Is ‘Years Away’ from Matching Web2, Says Protocol Labs CEO
entry.summary: Juan Benet said startups will eventually push past the computational limits of Web2.

entry.title: NFT Winter Isn’t Getting Any Warmer: Sales Down Another 25% in October
entry.summary: Both overall trading volume and total NFT sales shrank in October as the market continues to lose steam.

entry.title: Bitcoin Tumbles With Stocks Following Fed Chair Remarks on Inflation
entry.summary: Prices of Bitcoin and Ethereum dipped—along with stocks—after Jerome Powell said more hikes were likely.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Stocks Jump Following Fed’s Fourth Rate Hike
entry.summary: The Federal Reserve’s aggressive monetary policy continued today—and Bitcoin did what it usually does, following other risk assets.

entry.title: Warner Brothers Taps Nifty’s, Daz 3D to Launch Game of Thrones NFTs
entry.summary: The American media giant is rolling out digital collectibles, including iconic moments and characters, from the hit series Game of Thrones.

entry.title: Bored Apes Otherside Builder: Web3 ‘Only Plausible Solution’ to Manage Metaverse Economy
entry.summary: Improbable CEO Herman Narula argued that Web3 solutions are “the only means to efficiently share value in the metaverse.”

entry.title: OpenSea Now Auto-Detects and Blocks Stolen NFTs, Disables Scam Links
entry.summary: Leading NFT marketplace OpenSea unveiled new automated features to prevent scams and stop the resale of swiped assets.

entry.title: CZ Suggests Binance Pay as ‘Solution’ for Crypto Payments on Twitter
entry.summary: After Musk’s Twitter takeover, Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao said that his company is “ready to help” with crypto and Web3 on the platform.

entry.title: Third Time’s a Charm? Bitcoin Miner Bitdeer Delays $4B SPAC Deal Again
entry.summary: Bitcoin miner Bitdeer is again delaying its multi-billion dollar SPAC deal as crypto winter continues to grip the industry.

entry.title: Celsius Creditors' Lawyer 'Looking Into' Whether Firm Was a Ponzi Scheme: Report
entry.summary: The bankrupt crypto lender Celsius is under more scrutiny over fresh allegations of running a Ponzi scheme.

entry.title: Musk’s Twitter Reforms Could ‘Damage The Blue Check's Anti-Scam Role’: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin
entry.summary: Vitalik Buterin joined high-profile critics of Musk’s proposals, highlighting the importance of due diligence in the verification process.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Deribit Hacked for $28M in Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDC
entry.summary: Panama-based crypto exchange Deribit halted withdrawals after hackers made off with $28 million in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Circle's USDC.

entry.title: Report Claims 97% of Uniswap Tokens Are ‘Rug Pulls’—Crypto Twitter Has Doubts
entry.summary: The researchers found that "90% of tokens using locking contracts tend to become a rug pull or a malicious token eventually."

entry.title: Binance CEO: Crypto Is the 'Only Stable Thing' Amid Financial Turmoil
entry.summary: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao took to the stage at Web Summit to discuss regulators, the crypto crash, and Elon Musk's unpredictability.

entry.title: 'Rick & Morty' Creator’s Art Gobblers Renew Debate Over NFT Influencer Ethics
entry.summary: The buzzy launch upset many collectors, who allege that influencers hyped it in exchange for free NFTs now trading for nearly $23,000.

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds Above $20K Ahead of Fed’s Interest Rate Decision
entry.summary: The Fed will reveal tomorrow if it will continue to hike interest rates. Tuesday data suggests it might, but Bitcoin hasn't budged.

entry.title: Aave's Stani Kulechov: What Sets Our GHO Stablecoin Apart
entry.summary: Layer 2s like Optimism and Arbitrum will "radically decrease the cost of actually transacting and using blockchain-based security," Kulechov said.

entry.title: Coinbase Is Backing Ripple Against the SEC
entry.summary: America's largest crypto exchange is getting more and more vocal with its support for industry peers engaged in legal battles with the SEC.

entry.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces
entry.summary: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a metaverse."

entry.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap
entry.summary: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.

entry.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.

entry.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko
entry.summary: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.
